items.name: The Starry Night
items.description: A swirling night sky over a French village, painted in 1889 during van Gogh's stay at the Saint-Paul-de-Mausole asylum.

items.name: Mona Lisa
items.description: The enigmatic portrait of Lisa Gherardini, painted between 1503-1519, known for her mysterious smile.

items.name: The Great Wave off Kanagawa
items.description: A famous Japanese woodblock print depicting a giant wave threatening boats near Mount Fuji, created around 1831.

items.name: Girl with a Pearl Earring
items.description: A mysterious 17th-century Dutch painting featuring a girl wearing an exotic dress and a large pearl earring.

items.name: The Persistence of Memory
items.description: A surreal painting from 1931 featuring melting clocks in a dreamlike landscape, symbolizing the fluidity of time.

items.name: Guernica
items.description: A powerful anti-war painting created in 1937 in response to the bombing of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War.
